channel.title: Out Of Memory Run Error [Emulous]
channel.description:
Ok, normally when I get this error on any other source I just make -Xmx to like -Xmx512 or something but emulous doesn't have any of those it just has this in run
[code]@echo off title Server tskill java /a java -cp .;./bin; server.Server [/code]
How would I dedicate more memory to it?
